directions: Whisk together mayonnaise, sour cream, cheese, lemon juice, chives, salt, and pepper in a small bowl and thin with milk or water to desired consistency.
Toss iceberg, watercress, and celery in a large bowl and drizzle with dressing.
ingredients: 2 bunches watercress, coarse stems discarded (6 cups)
title: Iceberg and Watercress Salad with Blue Cheese Dressing
